title: Homemade mincemeat
ingredients: ['250g seedless raisins', '250g sultanas', '250g currants', '65g mixed peel', '250g cooking apples, peeled and finely chopped', '125g butter, softened', 'grated zest of 1/2 a lemon', 'grated zest of 1/2 an orange', '1/2 teaspoon cinnamon', 'pinch of nutmeg', 'pinch of allspice', '250g dark brown soft sugar', '250ml brandy or dark rum']
